subject: RE: [junit] JUnit not matching to my needs - execute order sh ows design flaw ?
msgSnippet: What about writing a TestRunner which first runs all the tests marked in a special way, and then runs all the others IFF all the first ones passed? Just an
messageBody:
What about writing a TestRunner which first runs all the tests marked in
a special way, and then runs all the others IFF all the first ones
passed?

Just an idea, Ilja
